Texts.Chs: ^cyan;套装加成：在使用突击步枪或能量武器时+5%暴击几率，毒抗+15%，物抗+5%，免疫：辐射、毒液、原液、液体^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^cyan;Set Bonus^reset; : ^green;Radiation, Poison and Proto Immunity^reset;, ^green;15% Poison Resistance^reset;, ^green;+5% Physical Resistance^reset;, ^green;Slime Immunity^reset;, ^green;+5% Crit Chance with assault rifles or energy weapons^reset;.
